features: AMERICA’S #1 SELLING DISHWAND: One package of Scotch-Brite Advanced Soap Control Dishwand Brush Scrubber; one pack contains one Scotch-Brite Dishwand
SMART CLEAN: Dish scrubber brush with a button that allows for precise, leak-free soap control
USE WITH NON-STICK COOKWARE: This dish cleaning brush features a built-in scraper to remove stuck-on food from non-stick cookware
SAFE FOR MOST SURFACES: This scrubbing brush is safe to use on non-stick cookware, countertops, showers, and more surfaces across the household
ANTIBACTERIAL*: The dish scrub brush’s bristles contain an agent that protects the bristles from bacterial odors to prevent bad smells
EASY CLEAN: Clean dish scrubbing brush in the dishwasher top rack; the scrubber head is easy to remove and replace
Bristles contain an agent that protects the bristles from bacterial odors. Product does not protect users or others from food-borne or disease causing bacteria. Clean thoroughly after each use
Store the dishwand with the handle pointed down to avoid soap leakage

When it is time to change the head, push the tab away from handle, slide refill off and push forward to remove. Remove Soap Stopper by pushing up through back of new head. Slide new head onto handle and click into place
body.description: Control your soap with the leak-free guaranteed Scotch-Brite Advanced Soap Control Dishwand, America's #1 Selling Dishwand. Who wants a dishwand that leaks soap? Or one that slips out of your hands? The Scotch-Brite Advanced Soap Control Dishwand is the answer! The Scotch-Brite Advanced Soap Control Dishwand keeps your hands out of the mess. Valve prevents soap from leaking, no matter how the dishwand is stored. Button allows for precise soap control, dispensing soap when and where needed. Scraper helps remove stuck-on food. Scotch-Brite Advanced Soap Control Brush Scrubber Dishwand is safe on non-stick cookware, countertops, tiles, showers and tubs and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Surprising Ally in Shower Cleaning
reviews.reviewText: Unleash the versatility of the Scotch-Brite Dishwand beyond the kitchen and discover its surprising effectiveness as a shower cleaner. This innovative cleaning tool, known for its scrubbing power and convenience, can make your bathroom cleaning routine a breeze. Some models of the Scotch-Brite Dishwand offer replaceable head options with different scrubbing surfaces. Choose a scrubbing surface that suits the type of cleaning your shower needs. For example, a non-scratch scrubber is ideal for tile surfaces. If your Scotch-Brite Dishwand has a liquid soap dispenser, fill it with your preferred bathroom cleaner or a mixture of water and white vinegar. This allows you to dispense the cleaning solution directly onto the surfaces as you scrub. Use the Scotch-Brite Dishwand to scrub the shower tiles and grout lines. The scrubbing action of the tool, combined with the cleaning solution, helps remove soap scum, mold, and other buildups. For glass shower doors, the Scotch-Brite Dishwand can be particularly effective. Scrub the glass surfaces, ensuring that the scrubber removes water spots and soap residue. The non-scratch scrubber option is gentle on glass. The Scotch-Brite Dishwand's scrubbing power and precision make it a valuable addition to your cleaning arsenal, transforming the way you tackle bathroom maintenance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tool for washing dishes
reviews.reviewText: The Scotch-Brite Dishwand is a great way to clean dishes, pots, and pans. It has a long handle that keeps your hands out of the mess, and the scrubbing head is tough enough to get even the toughest messes off. The dishwand also comes with a built-in soap dispenser, so you don't have to worry about wasting soap.I've been using the Scotch-Brite Dishwand for a few months now, and I'm really happy with it. It's made dishwashing so much easier and faster, and my dishes always come out clean. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a way to make dishwashing easier.Here are some of the pros and cons of the Scotch-Brite Dishwand:Pros:Long handle keeps hands out of the messTough scrubbing head gets tough messes offBuilt-in soap dispenserEasy to useAffordableCons:Sponge head can wear out quicklyCan be a bit bulkyOverall, I think the Scotch-Brite Dishwand is a great product. It's easy to use, affordable, and it gets the job done. If you're looking for a way to make dishwashing easier, I would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for price
reviews.reviewText: This is more sturdy than other brushes of this style. The bristles do break down a bit faster than other brushes I've had, but the screw top stays sealed and it holds a good volume of detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient and Convenient Dish Cleaning with Scotch-Brite Dishwand!
reviews.reviewText: I've always been on the lookout for tools that make my daily chores easier, and the Scotch-Brite Dishwand has exceeded my expectations when it comes to dish cleaning. This little tool has become my go-to companion in the kitchen!The design of the Dishwand is genius – it's incredibly ergonomic, fitting comfortably in my hand, making it easy to grip and maneuver. The scrubber brush is effective at tackling even the toughest, stuck-on food without scratching my cookware. I was pleasantly surprised by how gentle yet efficient the bristles are.The best part? The built-in soap dispenser! It's a game-changer, eliminating the need to constantly dip the brush in soapy water. With a simple press, a controlled amount of soap is dispensed directly onto the dishes, saving both time and soap. Plus, the replacement sponges are readily available, ensuring the Dishwand remains a long-lasting kitchen staple.I've noticed a significant reduction in the time I spend doing dishes since I started using the Scotch-Brite Dishwand. It has made the process much more efficient and enjoyable.If you're someone who values both efficiency and quality when it comes to kitchen tools, I highly recommend giving the Scotch-Brite Dishwand a try. It has earned its place as a must-have item in my kitchen, and I'm sure you'll feel the same way too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm very pleased with this brush. I needed one that would scrub a tub clean, getting into all the crevices and grooves (with Dawn dish liquid and white vinegar in the handle). This brush met my needs. I'm really happy I came across it! A very good, strong brush. I also bought replacement heads, but haven't even had to use any as of yet and I've had them all for MONTHS! It's a very durable brush! Well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to fill and it doesn't leak
reviews.reviewText: i have spent considerably more for a dish brush only to find that it didn't release the soap and was virtually useless. And, it leaked. This one is cheap and perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The other version is better..
reviews.reviewText: So I have two versions of this: this one, with the dispenser buttons that you have to push, and one without the buttons. Same brand. (I use this one for us and the buttonless one for my dog's bowls, lol.)I hate this one, I really do. The dispenser doesn't work, so you can press it all you want but the soap won't come out. I have to squirt dish soap on it manually to use it which completely defeats the purpose. Don't know if I got a defective one or what because the reviews for this brush were great! Probably going to get the other brush without the buttons to replace this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glad I found this
reviews.reviewText: This dish wand is a lifesaver for people like me who hate touching dirty dishes. It's easy to dispense the dishwashing liquid and bristles are great at scrubbing, even dried up food. The convenience doesn't end there – I also noticed the replacement pads are affordable. I'm curious to see how long before I need to change this one.
Excelente sistema de limpieza con dispensador de jabón incluido. Cerdas de excelente calidad y con la dureza precisa para una limpieza adecuada sin maltratar vajillas y sartenes.

reviews.reviewTitle: Durable, Consistent Soap Dispensing, Long Life….. Scrub On!
reviews.reviewText: My wife cooks, I clean. I am the king of the dish scrubber and I have been so frustrated with other products that last a week.Others stop dispensing, the soap button rips, and (so often) the head falls off (I used duct tape to keep one on).BUT NOT THIS ONE….. its incredible in its longevity; consistency; and effectiveness.Scrub on dishwashers!PS - I just wish they sold replacement heads because, like the EveryReady Bunny, this scrubber keeps on ticking.
Very useful for me. No regrets
Lo estoy usando para lavar mi baño/regadera y perfecto. Le cabe bastante jabón en el compartimiento y cuando se ultiliza no se derrama. Muy bueno el botón que se aprieta para liberar el jabón
